data.persona: I ride in boats to catch fish. I catch fish in the ocean. I usually get a boat full of fish.
data.description:
You are in the The stream.
The stream is always going. The water moves quickly in some places and slowly in other places. There is a dry spot on each side of the water. In some areas you will see animals drinking the water. There are also fish swimming around in the deeper parts of the stream.
There's some water, some rainfall, and a higher elevation here.

You are carrying a broken fishing pole, a weight, and a pouch, wearing a polishing cloth, a white cloth, a shirt, a ceremonial hat, and some boots, and wielding a knife.

data.mid_motivation: I want to sell my fish and make a lot of money.
data.long_motivation: I want to make enough money to buy a giant boat.
